text:
Mr. Carl H. Menzer
Director, WSUI-KSUI
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Carls
I certainly hope that you can attend the
NAEB Board Meeting on March 15th and the
Banquet the previous evening.
Yes, we will pay your expenses. Travel is
not tax free. We will have a voucher for
you to sign at Milwaukee; when you return,
merely send in an account of your expenses
and weâ€™ll type it up on your signed voucher.
Cordially yours.
William G. Harley
